title: Kinesis to Lambda with error handling
description: Create a Java Lambda function with Event Source as Kinesis Data source

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use AWS Lambda (Java runtime) to subscribe to events from a Kinesis Data Stream with error handling to avoid redundant message processing
This example uses AWS CDK constructs

bullets.text: AWS CDK Construct for Kinesis and Lambda

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
